product_name: Innova Disc Golf Champion Roc3 Mid-Range Disc
long_description: The straight-flying Innova Disc Golf Champion Roc3 mid-range disc excels at controlled approaches and mid-range drives. Easily throw accurate placement shots and slight hyzer shots with this disc's small diameter, straight flight and dependable fade. Crafted from a blend of resilient polymers to offer the best combination of grip and durability. Disc PDGA approved for use on all disc golf courses. Sorry, color and weight requests cannot be accommodated; please shop in-store for specific colors and weights.
short_description: The straight-flying Innova Disc Golf Champion Roc3 mid-range disc excels at controlled approaches and mid-range drives.
